{{disambig-two|the "Lord of the Rings" film character|third King of Rohan|[[Aldor]]}} {{Adaptation}} {{infobox character | people=[[Rohirrim|Rohir]] | name=Aldor | image=The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers - Aldor.jpg | caption="Aldor" in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position=Conscripted archer | location=[[Hornburg]] | affiliation=[[Rohirrim]] | language=[[Rohanese]]
[[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor=Making the first move during the [[Battle of the Hornburg]] | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair=Whitish gray hair and beard | eyes=Blue | clothing= | weapons=Bow | steed= }} '''Aldor''' was a [[Men|Man]] of [[Rohan]] who fought in the [[Battle of the Hornburg]]. Aldor was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]], where he was portrayed by [[Bruce Allpress]]. == History == Aldor prematurely shot his arrow and killed an [[Uruk-hai]] soldier, triggering the [[Orcs|Orc army]] to charge on the fortress. It is not known if he survived the battle. {{references}} {{title}} [[Category:Men from adaptations]] [[Category:The Lord of the Rings (film series) characters]] [[de: Aldor (Filmfigur)]]
